message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000.  It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope this revised offer works for you.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not able to go that low at this time.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500, which is still a good deal for you considering the value of the product.  Let's try to reach an agreement that works for both of us.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I can't go above $10,000. I hope this counteroffer is acceptable.
